title: "Frozen Frontier Explorers"
content:
# Welcome to Frozen Frontier Explorers!

Our website is dedicated to sharing the latest news and updates on our team of intrepid explorers as they venture into the frozen wastelands of distant planets. Equipped with state-of-the-art high-tech suits, our AInauts brave the harshest environments in search of new discoveries and scientific breakthroughs.

Follow along with us as we document our expeditions through stunning photos and videos, and learn about the cutting-edge technology that allows us to explore these remote locations. From towering ice formations to treacherous terrain, our team faces challenges at every turn, but their determination and expertise always prevail.

Join us on this thrilling journey into the unknown, and discover the wonders that lie beyond our own planet.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A group of AInauts in high-tech suits exploring a frozen wasteland on a distant planet, with towering ice formations all around them."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
